My Badges
Badge Info
The HTML/CSS badge is earned through completion of the HTML/CSS assessment. It is typically completed the first week of class. Knowledge of website positioning and media queries is crucial in completing this assessment.
HTML/CSS
The basic javascript badge is earned through successful completion of the basic javascript assessment. It is typically taken at the end of the second week of class.

Javascript
